content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. I am open to negotiations. Please make an offer for the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the ideal location and condition of the apartment, I propose starting the negotiation with a rental price of 550 Euros per month. I hope this figure can serve as a basis for further discussion.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is a low offer, considering the prime location and condition of the apartment. I counteroffer 700 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your response but at this stage as a student with budget constraints, I find your offer significantly higher than what I can afford. I would like to reiterate my initial rental price proposal of 550 Euros per month and hope we can reach an agreement on this basis.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your persistence, but 550 euros per month is far below my expectations for such a prime property. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you are offering is not acceptable.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood that we have differences in our expectations. In light of this situation, I will have to consider alternative options. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
